/>
IV.i.2.A.4.a
.
Examinations Based on ACE
In lieu of scheduling an in-person examination, VHA and contract examiners generally (subject to some limitations) have the option to complete a DBQ based on review of existing paper and/or electronic medical evidence.  They may also conduct an interview with the claimant.  Examinations based upon medical records and history without an in-person clinical examination or testing are known as
ACE examinations
or the
ACE Process
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Examination Requests Overview
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
